DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study estimate bioequivalence compare Linezolid 600 MG Oral Suspension 600 MG tablet Chinese healthy male subject . This study data use support Linezolid OS NDA China .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Comparing Linezolid 600 Mg Oral Suspension With 600 Mg Tablet In Chinese Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer . 1840 year old , male . BMI 1924kg/m2 . Alcohol , drug , smoke user . Sensitive oxazolidinones antibiotic class drug heparin . Severe medical psychiatric condition laboratory abnormality . Blood donation . 12ECG abnormal . Treatment study drug ; clinically significant .
